name: Polter Guest Summer 2020 Demo
description:
Explore the Spoopy town of Angston as you control Yula Jean the co-owner of Hector's Cabaret. You'll do mundane cleaning task, talk to citizens and save a lady from Demon Geese?

Takes between 30-50 minutes of playtime.

This was created as a Student Project for George Mason University's Capstone Class and now we're currently working on expanding the game. You can follow us on Twitter for updates on our progress as we expand the game

https://twitter.com/PolterGuestGame
